channel.title: SMF 70 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 70 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: SMF 70 Subtype 1
item.description: How to use this documentation? Samples Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF70PRO SMF70CTL SMF70CPU SMF70AID SMF70BCT SMF70BPD SMF70CIS SMF70LCS Samples Name Description lpar_information Request necessary fields from SMF70S1 on LPARs processor_information Request necessary fields from SMF70S1 on processors Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp time date Record Time Stamp interval_in_milliseconds interval Interval duration in milliseconds boost_class fla Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown cpa_scaling_factor_effective cpa_scaling_factor

item.title: SMF 70 Subtype 2
item.description: How to use this documentation? Virtual fields Record fields Maps and sections SMF70PRO R702TYP3 R702TYP4 R7024TC R702TYP5 R702CCF Virtual fields Name Based on Description timestamp time date Record Time Stamp interval_in_milliseconds interval Interval duration in milliseconds boost_class fla Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Record fields Name Based on Description Type/Format flg flag SMF70FLG SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS string prsm_mode flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE os flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 vxa flg MVS/XA IF ON esa flg MVS/ESA IF ON v4 flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON subtypes_used flg SUBTYPES USED new_record flg NEW RECORD FORMAT rty SMF70RTY RECORD TYPE integer date SMF70DTE Date of Record date time SMF70TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: Field - atd
item.description: Average Thread Density numerator for general purpose processors. Divid… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70ATD Description Average Thread Density numerator for general purpose processors. Divide this value by 1024 to get the average number of active threads for all general purpose processors that were dispatched to physical hardware and configured ONLINE for the complete interval.

item.title: Field - atdi
item.description: Average Thread Density numerator for zAAP. Divide this value by 1024 t… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70ATDI Description Average Thread Density numerator for zAAP. Divide this value by 1024 to get the average number of active threads for all zAAPs that were dispatched to physical hardware and configured ONLINE for the complete interval. A zero value is reported if no zAAP is currently installed.@98C

item.title: Field - atds
item.description: Average Thread Density numerator for zIIP. Divide this value by 1024 t… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70ATDS Description Average Thread Density numerator for zIIP. Divide this value by 1024 to get the average number of active threads for all zIIPs that were dispatched to physical hardware and configured ONLINE for the complete interval. A zero value is reported if no zIIP is currently installed.@71A

item.title: Field - boostinfo
item.description: Boost information Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70_BOOSTINFO Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description boostinfo_speed 1 Speed boost was active at some point within the interval. boostinfo_ziip 0 zIIP boost was active at some point within the interval.

item.title: Field - boostinfo_speed
item.description: Speed boost was active at some point within the interval. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: boostinfo Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field boostinfo.

item.title: Field - boostinfo_ziip
item.description: zIIP boost was active at some point within the interval. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: boostinfo Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field boostinfo.

item.title: Field - cai
item.description: Capacity-adjustment indication. When zero, the indication is not repor… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CAI Description Capacity-adjustment indication. When zero, the indication is not reported. When in the range 1 to 99, some amount of reduction is indicated. When 100, the machine is operating at its normal capacity. Temporary capacity changes that affect machine performance (for example, CBU or OOCoD) are not included

item.title: Field - cap_absolute
item.description: If not zero, absolute limit on partition usage of all CPUs of the type… Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70HW_CAP_LIMIT Description If not zero, absolute limit on partition usage of all CPUs of the type indicated in SMF70CIX in terms of numbers of hundredth of CPUs.

item.title: Field - cap_absolute_group
item.description: If not zero, absolute limit on partition usage of all CPUs of the type… Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70HWGR_CAP_LIMIT Description If not zero, absolute limit on partition usage of all CPUs of the type indicated in SMF70CIX which are members of the same hardware group, in terms of numbers of hundredth of CPUs.

item.title: Field - cap_actual_percentage
item.description: Number of Diagnose samples where capping actually limited the usage of… Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70NCA Description Number of Diagnose samples where capping actually limited the usage of processor resources for the set of logical CPUs of type SMF70CIX within the logical partition

item.title: Field - cap_limit_chng
item.description: SMF70HWGr_Name or SMF70HWGr_Cap_Limit has changed during the interval Map: SMF70BPD Based on: vpf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field vpf.

item.title: Field - cap_wlm_percentage
item.description: Number of Diagnose samples where WLM considers to cap the set of logic… Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70NSW Description Number of Diagnose samples where WLM considers to cap the set of logical CPUs of type SMF70CIX within the logical partition (see also SMF70NCA).

item.title: Field - capacity_group_member
item.description: Group flag. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: pfl Description This partition is member of a capacity group. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field pfl.

item.title: Field - capacity_limit_chng
item.description: Defined capacity limit has been changed Map: SMF70BCT Based on: pfg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field pfg.

item.title: Field - capactiy_group_name
item.description: Name of the capacity group this parition belongs to. Valid if bit 1 (S… Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70GNM Description Name of the capacity group this parition belongs to. Valid if bit 1 (SMF70GRP) of SMF70PFL is ON.

item.title: Field - ccn
item.description: NUMBER OF CPU CONTROL SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CCN

item.title: Field - ccp
item.description: Highest CPU Id currently installed This number can increase upon dynam… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CCP Description Highest CPU Id currently installed This number can increase upon dynamic CPU addition

item.title: Field - ccr
item.description: Capacity-change reason. Valid if SMF70CAI is non-zero. When 1, the cap… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CCR Description Capacity-change reason. Valid if SMF70CAI is non-zero. When 1, the capacity change is due to the setting of a manual control. When greater than 1, capacity change is due to an internal machine condition

item.description: OFFSET TO CPU CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CCS

item.description: Number of ICSF Services data sections Record: SMF70S2 Based on: SMF702CN

item.title: Field - cnf
item.description: Configuration activity flags Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70CNF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cpu_is_online 7 CPU online at end of interval data_invalid 6 Data invalid, varied ON or OFF cpu_varied 5 CPU was varied during Postprocessor duration interval data_available 4 Data available for a complete interval cpu_off 3 CPU is offline while core is online

item.title: Field - cnl
item.description: LENGTH OF CPU-IDENTIFICATION NAME SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CNL

item.title: Field - cnn
item.description: NUMBER OF CPU-IDENTIFICATION NAME SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CNN

item.title: Field - cns
item.description: OFFSET TO CPU-IDENTIFICATION NAME SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CNS

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF70PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF70PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - con
item.description: NUMBER OF LOGICAL CORE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CON

item.title: Field - cord_l1
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 1. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL1 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 0.

item.title: Field - cord_l2
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 1. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL2 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 1.

item.title: Field - cord_l3
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 1. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL3 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 2.

item.title: Field - cord_l4
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 1. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL4 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 3.

item.title: Field - cord_l5
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 1. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL5 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 4.

item.title: Field - cord_l6
item.description: Coordinate of the preferred dispatch location of the logical core at topological nesting level 6. Map: SMF70BCT Based on: SMF70CordL6 Description Valid if SMF70MaxNL > 5.

item.title: Field - core_flg
item.description: Logical Core Information Map: SMF70LCS Based on: SMF70_CORE_FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description lpb_valid 0 Core LPAR Busy time is valid

item.title: Field - core_id
item.description: Core identification Map: SMF70LCS Based on: SMF70_CORE_ID

item.title: Field - cos
item.description: OFFSET TO LOGICAL CORE DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70COS

item.title: Field - count_io
item.description: Number of I/Os for this CPU / (doubleword format) Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70NIO

item.title: Field - count_slh
item.description: Num of entries to the I/O SLIH Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70SLH

item.title: Field - count_srb
item.description: Number of SRB dispatches (doubleword format) Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70SRB

item.title: Field - count_tcb
item.description: Number of TCB dispatches (doubleword format) Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70TCB

item.title: Field - count_tpi
item.description: Number of TPI with CC=1 Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70TPI

item.title: Field - cp_max
item.description: CP processors maximum Map: SMF70AID Based on: SMF70CMM

item.title: Field - cp_min
item.description: CP processors minimum Map: SMF70AID Based on: SMF70CMN

item.title: Field - cp_promote_slices
item.description: CP promote slices (OPT parameter BLWLTRPCT) changed Map: SMF70CTL Based on: stf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field stf.

item.title: Field - cp_total
item.description: CP processors total value Map: SMF70AID Based on: SMF70CTT

item.title: Field - cpa_scaling_factor
item.description: Scaling factor for SMF70CPA_actual and SMF70CPA_actual_CBP. Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CPA_SCALING_FACTOR

item.title: Field - cpa_scaling_factor_effective
item.description: Scaling factor for SMF70CPA_actual and SMF70CPA_actual_CBP wherever they are used, else 1. Map: SMF70CTL Based on: cpa_scaling_factor, cpu_adjustment_factor_actual, cpu_control_section_length Description Scaling factor for SMF70CPA_actual and SMF70CPA_actual_CBP wherever they are used, else 1. Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: cpa_actual_filter = (cpu_adjustment_factor_actual != 0) & (cpu_control_section_length > 224) return cpa_scaling_factor.where(cpa_actual_filter, 1)

item.title: Field - cpc_type
item.description: CPC Type Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CPC_TYPE

item.title: Field - cpl
item.description: LENGTH OF CPU DATA SECTION Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CPL

item.title: Field - cpn
item.description: NUMBER OF CPU DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CPN

item.title: Field - cps
item.description: OFFSET TO CPU DATA SECTION Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CPS

item.title: Field - cpu_adjustment_factor
item.description: Physical CPU adjustment factor based on alternate CPU capability Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CPA

item.title: Field - cpu_adjustment_factor_actual
item.description: Physical CPU adjustment factor based on Model Capacity Rating (will be… Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CPA_ACTUAL Description Physical CPU adjustment factor based on Model Capacity Rating (will be used for converting processor time to service units). This value together with SMF70CPUA_scaling_factor replaces SMF70CPA.

item.title: Field - cpu_adjustment_factor_chng
item.description: Physical CPU adjustment factor changed Map: SMF70CTL Based on: stf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field stf.

item.title: Field - cpu_adjustment_factor_effective
item.description: Effective CPU adjustment factor Map: SMF70CTL Based on: cpu_adjustment_factor, cpu_adjustment_factor_actual, cpu_control_section_length Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: cpa_actual_filter = (cpu_adjustment_factor_actual != 0) & (cpu_control_section_length > 224) return cpu_adjustment_factor_actual.where(cpa_actual_filter, cpu_adjustment_factor)

item.title: Field - cpu_busy_percentage
item.description: CPU busy percentage Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cpu_busy_time, cpu_unparked_time, cpu_unparked_percentage Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: cpu_busy_percentage = cpu_busy_time * cpu_unparked_percentage / cpu_unparked_time

item.title: Field - cpu_busy_time
item.description: CPU busy time Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cpu_is_online, cpu_wait_time, cpu_parked_time, interval Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: cpu_busy_time = interval - cpu_wait_time - cpu_parked_time invalid_filter = cpu_is_online & (cpu_busy_time.total_seconds() >= 0.0) return cpu_busy_time.where(cpu_is_online, pd.Timedelta(0))

item.title: Field - cpu_control_section_length
item.description: LENGTH OF CPU CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF70S1 Based on: SMF70CCL

item.title: Field - cpu_count
item.description: Number of physical CPUs of this type at interval end Map: SMF70CIS Based on: SMF70CTN

item.title: Field - cpu_count_accumulated
item.description: Accumulated number of physical CPUs. Divide by SMF70DSA to get the ave… Map: SMF70CIS Based on: SMF70CAN Description Accumulated number of physical CPUs. Divide by SMF70DSA to get the average number of physical CPUs of this type applicable during the interval.

item.title: Field - cpu_id
item.description: CPU identifier Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70CID

item.title: Field - cpu_id_index
item.description: Index to the CPU-identification name section that contains the EBCDIC … Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70CIX Description Index to the CPU-identification name section that contains the EBCDIC name corresponding to the CPU type of the logical processor

item.title: Field - cpu_is_online
item.description: CPU online at end of interval Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - cpu_name
item.description: CPU-identification name Map: SMF70CIS Based on: SMF70CIN Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning CP CP IIP zIIP AAP zAAP IFL IFL ICF ICF SAP SAP default Unknown

item.title: Field - cpu_num
item.description: Number of CPU data sections for this core. Map: SMF70LCS Based on: SMF70_CPU_NUM Description This value represents the number of threads that are active on this core.

item.title: Field - cpu_off
item.description: CPU is offline while core is online Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - cpu_parked_percentage
item.description: CPU parked percentage Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cpu_parked_time, interval Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return cpu_parked_time / interval

item.title: Field - cpu_parked_time
item.description: CPU parked time Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70PAT

item.title: Field - cpu_polarization
Field - cpu_serial
item.description: CPU serial number, 6 hex digits Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70SER

item.title: Field - cpu_skip
item.description: The CPU data sections for this core are grouped together in the record. Map: SMF70LCS Based on: SMF70_CPU_SKIP Description To get to the first CPU data section associated with this logical core, skip over the number of CPU data sections specified by this field, starting at the first CPU data section in the record.

item.title: Field - cpu_type
item.description: CPU type: 0 = General purpose CP 1 = zAAP (IFA) 2 = zIIP Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70TYP Post-Processed The source values (SMF) are mapped in IBM SMF Explorer as follows: Source value IBM SMF Explorer meaning 0 CP 1 zAAP 2 zIIP default Unknown

item.title: Field - cpu_unparked_percentage
item.description: CPU unparked percentage Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cpu_unparked_time, interval_in_milliseconds Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: return cpu_unparked_time / interval

item.title: Field - cpu_unparked_time
item.description: CPU unparked time Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cpu_parked_time, interval, cpu_is_online, cpu_busy_time Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: cpu_unparked_time = interval - cpu_parked_time invalid_filter = cpu_is_online & (cpu_busy_time.total_seconds() >= 0) return cpu_unparked_time.where(invalid_filter, pd.Timedelta(0))

item.title: Field - cpu_varied
item.description: CPU was varied during Postprocessor duration interval Map: SMF70CPU Based on: cnf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field cnf.

item.title: Field - cpu_wait_time
item.description: CPU wait time Map: SMF70CPU Based on: SMF70WAT

item.title: Field - cr
item.description: ZEP field 0 Map: SMF70CTL Based on: SMF70CR

item.title: Field - crt_1024
item.description: 1024-bit CRT-format operations Map: R702TYP4 Based on: r7024msk Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r7024msk.

item.title: Field - crt_2048
item.description: 2048-bit CRT-format operations Map: R702TYP4 Based on: r7024msk Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r7024msk.

item.title: Field - crt_4096
item.description: 4096-bit CRT-format operations Map: R702TYP4 Based on: r7024msk Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r7024msk.

item.title: Field - cs

item.title: Sample - lpar_information
item.description: Request necessary fields from SMF70S1 on LPARs Sample fields The sample will fetch the following fields. Name Based on Description Type/Format flg flag SMF70FLG SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS string bfy flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE os flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 vxa flg MVS/XA IF ON esa flg MVS/ESA IF ON v4 flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON subtypes_used flg SUBTYPES USED new_record flg NEW RECORD FORMAT bfy virtual flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE os virtual flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 vxa virtual flg MVS/XA IF ON esa virtual flg MVS/ESA IF ON v4 virtual flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON subtypes_used virtual flg SUBTYPES USED new_record virtual flg NEW RECORD FORMAT rty SMF70RTY RECORD TYPE integer date SMF70DTE Date of Record date time SMF70TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: Field - lpar_management_per_cpu
item.description: Physical per CPU Utilization Map: SMF70BPD Based on: dispatch_time_total, dispatch_time_effective, logical_processor_online_time, cpu_count Description Average physical per CPU Utilization. Multiply with LPAR online LCP count to get LPAR CPU utilization. Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: lpar_management_per_cpu = 100 * (dispatch_time_total - dispatch_time_effective) / logical_processor_online_time lpar_management_per_cpu = lpar_management_per_cpu / cpu_count

item.title: Field - pow
item.description: Weight for the logical CPU when HiperDispatch mode is active. See bit … Map: SMF70BPD Based on: SMF70POW Description Weight for the logical CPU when HiperDispatch mode is active. See bit 2 (SMF70PWF) of SMF70PFL. Multiplied by a factor of 4096 for more granularity. The value may be the same or different for all shared CPUs of type SMF70CIX. This is an accumulated value. Divide by the number of Diagnose samples SMF70DSA to get the average weight value for the interval.

Name Based on Description Type/Format flg flag SMF70FLG SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS string bfy flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE os flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 vxa flg MVS/XA IF ON esa flg MVS/ESA IF ON v4 flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON subtypes_used flg SUBTYPES USED new_record flg NEW RECORD FORMAT bfy virtual flg SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE os virtual flg OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 vxa virtual flg MVS/XA IF ON esa virtual flg MVS/ESA IF ON v4 virtual flg MVS/ESA V4 IF ON subtypes_used virtual flg SUBTYPES USED new_record virtual flg NEW RECORD FORMAT rty SMF70RTY RECORD TYPE integer date SMF70DTE Date of Record date time SMF70TME Time of Record time timestamp virtual time

item.title: Field - prod
item.description: Multithreading core productivity numerator. Map: SMF70LCS Based on: SMF70_PROD Description Divide this value by 1024 to get the multithreading core productivity. A zero value is reported if the core was not configured ONLINE for the complete interval. If SMF70_CPU_NUM is greater than 1, the core productivity represents the percentage of how much work the core resources accomplished while dispatched to physical hardware over the maximum amount of work the core resources could have accomplished while dispatched to physical hardware.

item.title: Field - share_current

item.title: Field - utilization_per_cpu_physical
item.description: Physical per CPU Utilization Map: SMF70BPD Based on: dispatch_time_total, logical_processor_online_time, cpu_count Description Average physical per CPU Utilization. Multiply with LPAR online LCP count to get LPAR CPU utilization. Post-Processed The field is created using the following pseudocode: utilization_per_cpu_physical = 100 * dispatch_time_total / logical_processor_online_time utilization_per_cpu_physical = utilization_per_cpu_physical / cpu_count
